workerManagerResourceSpotAllocation

Class MineralPatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • workerManagerResourceSpotAllocation.MineralPatch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GatheringSource

    class MineralPatch
extends java.lang.Object
implements GatheringSource
    MineralPatch.java --- Wrapper Class for mineral spots that are going to be managed by MineralPatchManager instances as GatheringSources. Each mineral patch is located at a specific BaseLocation and has multiple gathering spots.
    Author:
    P H - 03.09.2017

    • Method Detail

      • addWorker

        public boolean addWorker(ResourceManagerEntry worker)
        Description copied from interface: GatheringSource
        Function for adding a ResourceManagerEntry to a GatheringSource. This worker must be managed and therefore assigned a gathering source by the implementing Class.
        Specified by:
        addWorker in interface GatheringSource
        Parameters:
        worker - the worker that is going to be added towards the GatheringSource.
        Returns:
        true if the worker was successfully added towards the GatheringSource, false if either no space is available or the worker could not be added towards the GatheringSource.

      • mapWorker

        private boolean mapWorker(ResourceManagerEntry worker)
        Function for mapping a worker to a specific single gathering spot since there are multiple possible ones at a single BaseLocation.
        Parameters:
        worker - the worker that is going to be mapped to a mineral spot.
        Returns:
        true if the worker was successfully mapped to a mineral spot, false if not.

      • removeWorker

        public boolean removeWorker(ResourceManagerEntry worker)
        Description copied from interface: GatheringSource
        Function for removing a worker from the GatheringSource he was previously added to.
        Specified by:
        removeWorker in interface GatheringSource
        Parameters:
        worker - the worker that is going to be removed from the GatheringSource.
        Returns:
        true if the worker was successfully remove from the GatheringSource, false if either the Unit was not added towards it or the Unit was not successfully removed.

      • containsWorker

        public boolean containsWorker(ResourceManagerEntry worker)
        Description copied from interface: GatheringSource
        Function for testing if a ResourceManagerEntry was previously added towards the GatheringSource.
        Specified by:
        containsWorker in interface GatheringSource
        Parameters:
        worker - the worker that the GatheringSource is being tested for.
        Returns:
        true if the worker was added towards the GatheringSource, false if not.

      • isSpaceAvailable

        public boolean isSpaceAvailable()
        Description copied from interface: GatheringSource
        Function for testing if ResourceManagerEntrys can be added towards a GatheringSource.
        Specified by:
        isSpaceAvailable in interface GatheringSource
        Returns:
        true if workers (ResourceManagerEntrys) can be added towards the GatheringSource, false if not.

      • getAvailableSpace

        public int getAvailableSpace()
        Description copied from interface: GatheringSource
        Function for retrieving the number of workers that can be currently added towards a GatheringSource since a GatheringSource can only hold a limited number of workers simultaneously.
        Specified by:
        getAvailableSpace in interface GatheringSource
        Returns:
        the number of workers that can be added towards the GatheringSource.

      • updateFreeWorkerSpots

        private void updateFreeWorkerSpots()

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getGatheringSource

        public bwapi.Unit getGatheringSource(ResourceManagerEntry worker)
        Description copied from interface: GatheringSource
        Function for actually retrieving the Unit / gathering spot that a previously added worker was assigned to internally.
        Specified by:
        getGatheringSource in interface GatheringSource
        Parameters:
        worker - the ResourceManagerEntry representing the worker that was previously added and whose gathering spot is now requested.
        Returns:
        the Unit / gathering spot the ResourceManagerEntry was assigned to or null if the Unit assigned Unit is no longer available.
